notes:
Sprint Planning Meeting - March 15, 2024

Attendees: Sarah Chen (Product Manager), Mike Johnson (Tech Lead), Lisa Wang (Backend Engineer), Tom Brown (Frontend Engineer)

Agenda:
1. Review previous sprint
2. Plan upcoming sprint goals
3. Assign tasks

Discussion:
- Sarah presented the product roadmap for Q2
- Decided to prioritize the user authentication feature over analytics dashboard
- Mike suggested using OAuth2 for authentication - team agreed
- Lisa raised concerns about database performance, we will need to add indexes

Action Items:
- Sarah to finalize user stories for authentication by EOW
- Mike will research OAuth2 providers by March 20
- Lisa to implement database indexes by next Tuesday
- Tom will create mockups for the login page (high priority) by March 18
- Everyone to review the API documentation before next meeting

Decisions Made:
- Approved OAuth2 for authentication
- Sprint goal: Complete user authentication MVP
- Moved analytics dashboard to next sprint
- Agreed on daily standups at 10 AM

Next Meeting: March 22, 2024 - Sprint Review

Notes: This was a productive meeting. Team is aligned on priorities.
